title: Optimize performance with caching
description: Cache branch information to reduce unnecessary git calls, implement intelligent caching that invalidates on relevant events, and batch status updates when possible to reduce WorkTrunk command invocations.

title: Improve error handling and validation
description: Add WorkTrunk installation check, better error messages with actionable guidance, and input validation for branch names and operations. Tools should provide helpful error messages when WorkTrunk is not installed or configured.

title: Add worktrunk-default-branch tool
description: Create tool to get default branch dynamically using 'wt config state default-branch'. Enables scripts to work on any repo without hardcoding main/master.
close_reason: Implemented default branch tool with tests. Committed in 76e4369 Add CI monitoring support to worktrunk-list

title: Enhance tool descriptions and examples
description: Add comprehensive examples to tool descriptions, include usage patterns, and provide better guidance on when to use each tool. Make descriptions more actionable for Claude.

title: Add tool for manual status update
description: Add a worktrunk-status-update tool that allows Claude to manually trigger status marker updates, useful for explicit status changes or recovery from missed updates.

title: Enhance status tracking reliability
description: Handle branch changes that occur outside the plugin (e.g., manual git checkout), improve debouncing strategy, and handle edge cases like detached HEAD, no branch detected, or branch name changes. Add periodic branch refresh to detect external changes.

title: Add shortcuts support (@ and -) to WorkTrunk tools
description: Support WorkTrunk shortcuts: @ for current branch, - for previous worktree. Apply to worktrunk-switch, worktrunk-create, and new worktrunk-remove tool.
close_reason: Implemented shortcuts support with tests. Committed in ec48ca9 Add shortcuts support and worktrunk-remove tool

title: Add stacked branches support to worktrunk-create
description: Add optional 'base' parameter to worktrunk-create tool to support --base=@ flag for creating branches from current HEAD instead of default branch. Enables stacked branch workflows.
close_reason: Implemented stacked branches support with tests. Committed in 08a8a66 Add stacked branches support to worktrunk-create

title: Analyze eval results and fix failures
description: Once eval results are available, analyze failures, identify root causes, and create fixes. Review LLM judge feedback, tool call patterns, and error scenarios to improve plugin reliability and functionality.

title: Add WorkTrunk hook integration support
description: Explore and integrate with WorkTrunk hooks system to provide more advanced features like automatic PR creation, CI status updates, or custom workflow automation. Research available hooks and implement useful integrations.

title: Improve documentation and troubleshooting
description: Expand README with more comprehensive examples, add troubleshooting section for common issues, document tool usage patterns, and provide migration guide for users upgrading the plugin.

title: Add worktrunk-remove tool
description: Create new tool to remove WorkTrunk worktrees using 'wt remove' command. Support shortcuts like @ for current worktree.
close_reason: Implemented worktrunk-remove tool with tests. Committed in ec48ca9 Add shortcuts support and worktrunk-remove tool

title: Add CI monitoring support to worktrunk-list
description: Enhance worktrunk-list with --full --branches option to show PR/CI status across all branches, including those without worktrees. Useful for monitoring CI across parallel work.
close_reason: Implemented CI monitoring support with tests. Committed in 76e4369 Add CI monitoring support to worktrunk-list

title: Change plugin to default export
description: Other OpenCode plugins use 'export default plugin' but our plugin uses 'export const WorkTrunkPlugin'. OpenCode may require default exports for proper plugin loading. Change to default export pattern matching other plugins.

title: Add JSON API support to worktrunk-list tool
description: Enhance worktrunk-list to support --format=json flag for structured output that can be parsed programmatically. This enables better integration with dashboards and scripts.
close_reason: Implemented JSON API support with tests. Committed in a0aee30 Add JSON API support to worktrunk-list tool

title: Add edge case and error scenario tests
description: Expand test coverage for edge cases: WorkTrunk not installed, invalid branch names, operations on non-existent branches, detached HEAD state, and error recovery scenarios. Add integration tests for complex workflows.

title: Fix plugin tools not being exposed to agent
description: CRITICAL: All evals failed because plugin tools (worktrunk-list, worktrunk-switch, etc.) are not being registered or exposed to the agent. The agent tries to use them as bash commands instead. Need to investigate plugin loading, tool registration, and ensure tools are properly exposed in OpenCode plugin API.
